question: This country's quality of nationality is ranked highest in the world.
explanation: According to the Henley & Partners - Kochenov Quality of Nationality Index (QNI) Germany's quality of nationality is ranked first in the world. Germany scored 82.7% out of a possible 100% on the index while Afghanistan sitting at the bottom of the index with a score of 14.6%. India was ranked 101 among 159 countries. The index takes into account various factors including the country's economic growth and level of human development.
